adrFormatAddress: 146 W 95th St #1b, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: My dear friend Carol was suffering from chronic pain and dementia and had no family or friends willing to help or provide companionship. It was a difficult situation. Kathleen carefully and expertly selected home heath aides for Carol and even personally tended to her occasional excentricities. There are no limits to Kathleen's dedication to her clients. She was there for my friend, and me, when needed--and sometimes when Carol "wanted." Living thousands of miles from New York City this was a blessing and helped take the worry out of my day. I knew my dear friend was being looked after and in the best possible hands. I remember when Kathleen climbed 12 flights of stairs (twice) to make sure Carol was safe during an electrical outage in her building. Kathleen and staff communicated with me often and alerted me when things were awry. When Carol recently needed emergency medical attention, Kathleen joined her aide at the hospital and stayed with Carol FOR HOURS until I could arrive. Kathleen helped me communicate with the medical team from a distance and was able to ensure that my dear friend's final wishes were respected. I don't call this an agency--I call Griswold Home Care BETTER THAN FAMILY.

originalText.text: Griswold did a fantastic job getting us just the right amount of help, right away, with a really special helper.  My father lost his wife of 45 years last spring.  My brother, sister and I are not close by.  My independent father needed some daily help with food shopping, getting meals together and some light cleaning.  He also had some specific requests about timing. Griswold worked with us very promptly to find someone available to help us with just what he wanted and needed.  And when my father had a change in living situation, Griswold again worked with us, right away, to adjust things to make sure my father is getting what he needs.  I can’t say enough about how happy we’ve all been with the service, including my father.  Thanks everyone at Griswold!

originalText.text: Griswold Home Care was extremely helpful to me when I needed care for my mom.  Kathleen was extremely cooperative when I requested things out of the ordinary.  I highly recommend the services that they provide and would consider using them again if the situation reoccurred.
